data.title: Objectives:: 1.define Weather and Climate 2.explain How Latitude and Altitude Affects Climate
data.meta_description: ist demo - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document defines weather and climate, and explains how latitude and altitude affect climate. It classifies pictures as examples of weather or climate. Weather is the short-term atmospheric conditions of an area, while climate is the average weather over a longer period of time. Latitude affects climate, with areas closer to the equator experiencing warmer temperatures and a tropical climate, while areas farther from the equator have cooler temperatures and polar or temperate climates. The document includes interactive activities asking students to label parts of a diagram showing the sun's rays on the earth and to identify the latitude and climate of different countries.
data.text: Objectives:: 1.define Weather and Climate 2.explain How Latitude and Altitude Affects Climate
